title: ICYMI - Bill Gates on COVID-19 Challenges, Climate Change and Podcasting with Rashida Jones
itunes:title: ICYMI - Bill Gates on COVID-19 Challenges, Climate Change and Podcasting with Rashida Jones
description:
Bill Gates discusses America's handling of the pandemic, steps needed to fight climate change and his podcast "Bill Gates and Rashida Jones Ask Big Questions."

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
